Question: Shenzhen Kaadas Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Kaadas Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd.

Smart Lock Solutions at CES 2024

- 35+ years of expertise in smart lock industry
- Expanded into the North American market with Wi-Fi and Z-Wave smart lock solutions
- Global presence across six continents and over 36 countries
- Three state-of-the-art factories with in-house R&D team
- End-to-end product development with in-house control and input
- Robust research and development team for cutting-edge solutions

No further information available.
